remarks: Show that a function is the inverse of a bijective function if their composition is the identity function.  Formerly part of proof of ~ fcof1o .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fcof1oinvd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
fcof1oinvd.g $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> A ) $.
fcof1oinvd.b $e |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
fcof1oinvd $p |- ( ph -> `' F = G ) $.
